i.name: Living Vengeance
i.description: On kill or assist, Varus temporarily gains Attack Speed. This bonus is larger if the enemy is a champion.

q.name: Piercing Arrow
q.description: Varus readies and then fires a powerful shot that gains extra range and damage the longer he spends preparing to fire.

w.name: Blighted Quiver
w.description: Passive: Varus' basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and apply Blight. Varus' other abilities detonate Blight, dealing magic damage based on the target's maximum Health. Active: Varus empowers his next Piercing Arrow.

e.name: Hail of Arrows
e.description: Varus fires a hail of arrows that deal physical damage and desecrate the ground. Desecrated ground slows enemies' Movement Speed and reduces their self healing and regeneration.

r.name: Chain of Corruption
r.description: Varus flings out a damaging tendril of corruption that immobilizes the first enemy champion hit and then spreads towards nearby uninfected champions, immobilizing them too on contact.

riot.name: Living Vengeance
riot.description: On kill or assist, Varus temporarily gains Attack Speed. This bonus is larger if the enemy is a champion.

riot.name: Piercing Arrow
riot.description: Varus readies and then fires a powerful shot that gains extra range and damage the longer he spends preparing to fire.
riot.tooltip:
First Cast: Varus starts drawing back his next shot, gradually increasing its range and damage. While preparing to shoot Varus' Movement Speed is slowed by {{ e7 }}%. After {{ e5 }} seconds, Piercing Arrow fails but refunds {{ e4 }}% of its Mana cost.

Second Cast: Varus fires, dealing {{ totaldamagemintooltip }} to {{ totaldamagemax }} physical damage, reduced by {{ e3 }}% per enemy hit (minimum {{ e9 }}%).

Piercing Arrow's cooldown is reduced by {{ f1 }} seconds if the arrow detonates Blight stacks on at least one enemy champion.

q1.blurb: Varus readies and then fires a powerful shot that gains extra range and damage the longer he spends preparing to fire.
description: {{sbc|First Cast:}} '''Varus''' {{tip|channel|charges}} for up to 4 seconds to gradually increase ''Piercing Arrow's'' {{sti|range}} and damage over the next 2 seconds, during which he is {{tip|pacify|pacified}} and {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 20%.
''Piercing Arrow'' is canceled when the charge ends, refunding {{sti|mana|{{as|half of the mana cost}}}}.

{{sbc|Second Cast:}} '''Varus''' fires a piercing arrow dealing {{tip|physical damage|{{as|physical damage}}}} to all enemies struck, which is increased by {{pp|11|type=Channel time|key=%|0 to 50|0 to 2|displayformula=5% per 0.2 seconds. ''This is capped at 2 seconds.''}}, but the arrow's damage gets reduced to {{pp|6|type=enemy hit|key=%|100 to 40;33|0 to 5|displayformula=100% - (15% per enemy hit). ''This is capped at 33% damage.''}}.
Detonating {{ai|Blighted Quiver|Varus|Blight}} stacks on an enemy champion reduces ''Piercing Arrow's'' {{sti|cooldown}} by 4 seconds.
leveling:
{{st|Minimum Physical Damage|{{ap|10|46.7|83.3|120|156.7}} {{as|(+ 110% AD)}}|Minimum Fully Reduced Damage|{{ap|3.3|15.6|27.8|40|52.2}} {{as|(+ {{fd|36.3}}% AD)}}}}<!--

q1.name: Piercing Arrow
notes: * Despite being {{tip|pacify|pacified}}, ''Varus'' can still {{si|Flash}} (and cast all other [[summoner spells]] except {{si|Teleport}}) during ''Piercing Arrow's'' channel.
* The range of the spell will always be displayed, even as it increases.
* Using {{si|Recall}} while charging ''Piercing Arrow'' will also cancel the cast.

riot.name: Blighted Quiver
riot.description: Passive: Varus' basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and apply Blight. Varus' other abilities detonate Blight, dealing magic damage based on the target's maximum Health. Active: Varus empowers his next Piercing Arrow.
riot.tooltip:
Passive: Varus' basic attacks deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage and apply Blight for {{ e3 }} seconds (stacks {{ e4 }} times).

Varus' other abilities detonate Blight, dealing magic damage equal to {{ e2 }}% (+{{ a2 }}%) of the target's maximum Health per stack.

Active: Varus' next Piercing Arrow deals bonus magic damage equal to {{ f2*100 }}% to {{ f1*100 }}% of the target's missing health (scales with Piercing Arrow charge).

Blighted Quiver is capped at {{ e5 }} damage against monsters.

w1.blurb: Varus' basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and apply Blight. Varus' other abilities detonate Blight, dealing magic damage based on the target's maximum Health.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Varus'''' [[basic attack]]s deal {{tip|magic damage|{{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}}} and apply '''Blight''' for 6 seconds, stacking up to 3 times.
'''Varus'''' other abilities detonate '''Blight''' on enemies upon damaging them, dealing {{as|magic damage}} for each stack. This damage is capped at 360 against monsters.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Varus'''' next {{ai|Piercing Arrow|Varus}} deals {{as|{{pp|5|key=%|changedisplay=true|6 to 14|1 to 13}} of the target's '''missing''' health}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}, increased by {{pp|type=Piercing Arrow channel time|11|key=%|0 to 50|0 to 2|formula=5% per 0.2 seconds. ''This is capped at 2 seconds.''}}, for a maximum of {{as|{{pp|5|key=%|changedisplay=true|6*1.5 to 14*1.5|1 to 13}} of the target's '''missing''' health}}. This damage is capped at 360 against monsters.

''Blighted Quiver'' can be cast during the first {{fd|0.25}} seconds of {{ai|Piercing Arrow|Varus}}. If the arrow is not fired within 5 seconds, ''Blighted Quiver'' is placed on a 1 second cooldown, or on full cooldown if the charge is canceled.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage per Stack|{{as|{{ap|3 to 5}}% {{as|(+ 2% per 100 AP)}} of the target's '''maximum''' health|health)}}|Maximum Magic Damage|{{as|{{ap|9 to 15}}% {{as|(+ 6% per 100 AP)}} of the target's '''maximum''' health|health)}}}}
w1.name: Blighted Quiver
notes: * {{tip|Spell shield}} will not block the {{tip|on-hit}} damage but will block the consuming damage if the target is hit by his abilities.
* ''Blighted Quiver's'' active damage is dealt after the damage of {{ai|Piercing Arrow|Varus}}.

riot.name: Hail of Arrows
riot.description: Varus fires a hail of arrows that deal physical damage and desecrate the ground. Desecrated ground slows enemies' Movement Speed and reduces their self healing and regeneration.
riot.tooltip:
Varus fires a hail of arrows that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and desecrates the ground for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Desecrated Ground slows enemy Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% and reduces healing effects by {{ e4 }}%.

e1.blurb: Varus fires a hail of arrows that deal physical damage and desecrate the ground. Desecrated ground slows enemies' Movement Speed and reduces their self healing and regeneration.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Varus''' fires a hail of arrows that deals {{as|physical damage}} on impact to all enemies in the target area.
The area is desecrated for 4 seconds, {{tip|slow|slowing}} all enemies standing in it and applying {{tip|Grievous Wounds}}.
e1.name: Hail of Arrows
notes: * Slows will linger for {{fd|0.25}} seconds after leaving the marked area.

riot.name: Chain of Corruption
riot.description: Varus flings out a damaging tendril of corruption that immobilizes the first enemy champion hit and then spreads towards nearby uninfected champions, immobilizing them too on contact.
riot.tooltip:
Varus flings out a tendril of corruption that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and immobilizes the first enemy champion hit for {{ e2 }} seconds.

The corruption then spreads towards nearby uninfected enemy champions. If it reaches them, they take the same damage and are also immobilized. Immobilized units gain {{ e4 }} Blight stacks over the duration.

r1.blurb: Varus flings out a damaging tendril of corruption that immobilizes the first enemy champion hit and then spreads towards nearby uninfected champions, immobilizing them too on contact.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Varus''' flings out a tendril of corruption that infects the first enemy champion hit, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|root|rooting}} them for 2 seconds while inflicting them with full stacks of {{ai|Blighted Quiver|Varus|Blight}} over {{fd|1.5}} seconds.

On impact, the tendril seeks out nearby enemy champions for 2 seconds, after which they are also infected. Tendrils will continue to spread until there are no champions in range that have not already been affected.
'''Chain of Corruption''' will attempt to spread even if the first target dies or becomes free of the snare.
r1.name: Chain of Corruption
notes: * Enemy champions can be targeted again by the corruption if they were not affected the previous time, even if they were targeted and got out of range.

* Consuming the {{ais|Blighted Quiver|Varus|Blight}} stacks applied by ''Chain of Corruption'' will deal bonus magic damage based on {{ais|Blighted Quiver|Varus}} rank. If {{ai|Blighted Quiver|Varus}} hasn't been ranked yet, the three {{ais|Blighted Quiver|Varus|Blight}} stacks will still be applied but they will be considered to be at rank 0, dealing {{as|{{fd|1.25}}% {{as|(+ 2% per 100 AP)}} of the target's '''maximum''' health}} per stack.
